channel.title: Things Gone With Upgrade
channel.description: When the server was upgraded I went back to my house and both of my chests were empty. I used bb stick on the chests and it didn't say anyone changed it. What happened?

item.title: Things Gone With Upgrade
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Yea sorry, I talk like that sometimes.

Read full topic

item.title: Things Gone With Upgrade
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:19, topic:398684”][quote author=zuppers link=topic=495821.msg3625795#msg3625795 date=1307826653]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=495821.msg3625790#msg3625790 date=1307826390]
That then unbalances it for people that want to raid
[/quote]What about if only people who wanted to raid could be raided?
[/quote]That’s what I was thinking. You choose (maybe you can change once per week, or whatever) to be peaceful or not. If you’re not, you can pvp/raid/steal, but if you are, you can’t pvp/raid/steal

But I don’t see how we would do that[/quote]Good idea to me!

Read full topic

item.title: Things Gone With Upgrade
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

reyx7:

Also, pistons will be in 1.7, which will add a whole new dimension of traps and chest hiding.

Yeah, it’s a lot more interesting securing your chests with actual game features rather than having annoying rules and commands.

Read full topic

item.title: Things Gone With Upgrade
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“badger41, post:37, topic:398684”][quote author=Ⅽole link=topic=495821.msg3626479#msg3626479 date=1307860108]

I believe raiding chests that are left in the open is ok, but when you thoroughly search someones residence for hidden chests for the purpose of stealing/annoying the owner, then that should be against the rules.

I’ve done it, some people are smart enough to not leave them in the open lol.

I know theyre smart enough… most chests that are left in the open and are not locked are usually filled with items that are not essential to the daily activities of that person and thats why they should be alright to raid. But when someone goes through some trouble to find a decent hiding place to hide their chests so they can store useful items in it etc then it should be a no no to solely search for that chest.

Making that against the rules would totally eliminate the whole “1 locked chest” thing, though.
[/quote]

Then have no chest locks?[/quote]
No, because what if someone griefs the shit out of your house, goes into your good chest, and burns the items, then gets banned? Now you have nothing. This server can’t be trusted.
Also, pistons will be in 1.7, which will add a whole new dimension of traps and chest hiding.

Read full topic

Then have no chest locks?

item.title: Things Gone With Upgrade
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[quote=“zuppers, post:27, topic:398684”][quote author=Tom_BETA link=topic=495821.msg3625887#msg3625887 date=1307830649]

[quote author=zuppers link=topic=495821.msg3625873#msg3625873 date=1307830264]

Why? I don’t understand what the problem is. Why can’t we just keep vanilla instead of messing with different types of game play and ruining it. If you don’t want your chests raided then you should hide them.

It would end up being like musical chairs but with different modes. You either chose a Pvp enabled server with raiding, or a server with no pvp/raiding.
[/quote]Because not everyone is playing fair people are using mods to find peoples chest.

EDIT: Also lets stop pretending the server is vanilla lol.

So because some people are cheating we must completely rearrange the game? I disagree. You can’t claim every report of someone xraying is legitimate so there is no way to measure the amount of cheating.

This server uses as little plugins as possible, all plugins are for server security and rule enforcement pretty much. There is a fine line between rule enforcement plugins and a musical game types adaptation.

If there is one thing which annoys me it is playing a server which doesn’t feel like minecraft, and adding that makes me uncomfortable.
[/quote]Adding the ability for some players to opt-out of pvp makes you uncomfortable?[/quote]

Yep.

Read full topic

It would end up being like musical chairs but with different modes. You either chose a Pvp enabled server with raiding, or a server with no pvp/raiding.
[/quote]Because not everyone is playing fair people are using mods to find peoples chest.

EDIT: Also lets stop pretending the server is vanilla lol.

So because some people are cheating we must completely rearrange the game? I disagree. You can’t claim every report of someone xraying is legitimate so there is no way to measure the amount of cheating.

This server uses as little plugins as possible, all plugins are for server security and rule enforcement pretty much. There is a fine line between rule enforcement plugins and a musical game types adaptation.

If there is one thing which annoys me it is playing a server which doesn’t feel like minecraft, and adding that makes me uncomfortable.[/quote]Adding the ability for some players to opt-out of pvp makes you uncomfortable?

Read full topic
